title: Content Manager, Sports Radio - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Content Manager, Sports Radio Posted/Updated: 10-23-2015 Brief Job Description: Maintain day-to-day relationships with key Sports Group internal stakeholders across television, digital, social media, public relations, and Regional Sports Networks teams   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
